Fetches the specified policy version, or the latest if no version is provided.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The id of the policy to fetch.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"version","in":"query","description":"The version of the policy to fetch. Each time a policy is updated, the older version is still stored. If this is left empty, the latest policy is fetched.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
